A slight grin of sadistic pleasure drew itself on the metal dragon. 
This could get out of hands. AzureBlade had the problem of going 
berserk in battles. The last time, he had killed a decepticon and 
crippled a second one.

AzureBlade: Yes sir!

He drops the robot, and takes a step back. He knew he had to remain in 
control of himself.

AzureBlade: AzureBlade, Maximize!

He transformed to his bot mode, but kept his weapons down... for 
now...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod/Prowl::
> 
> They both turned around and saw that the bot was up.
> "Azure, drop him, and we'll make him scrap!" Ordered Prowl.
